H.R.7606 - Meat and Poultry Special Investigator Act of 2022: This bill addresses provisions related to agriculture, food, and fuel, including by providing funds for nutrient management, precision agriculture, and biofuel infrastructure, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7606?s=3&r=17 
H.R.7291 - American Beef Labeling Act of 2022, This bill reinstates mandatory country-of-origin labeling requirements for beef: https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7291?s=3&r=18 
H.R.7019 - Rural Prosperity Act of 2022, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7019?s=3&r=21 
H.R.5680 - SWEETER Act, This bill eliminates certain Department of Agriculture (USDA) sugar subsidy programs: https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5680?s=3&r=39 
H.R.5173 - Urban Agriculture and Community Food Security Act: https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5173?s=3&r=51 
H.R.4896 - Reimbursing Agricultural Producers for Immigration Damages Act: This bill temporarily establishes a program to reimburse agricultural producers for damages to livestock, crops, and property that result from the actions of an alien present in the United States without lawful immigration status, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/4896?s=3&r=56 
H.R.4269 - Dairy Pricing and Policy Commission Act of 2021: This bill directs the Department of Agriculture (USDA) to temporarily establish the Dairy Pricing and Policy Commission, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/4269?s=3&r=67 
H.R.4103 - Meat and Poultry Special Investigator Act: This bill establishes within the Department of Agriculture's Packers and Stockyards Division the Office of the Special Investigator for Competition Matters, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/4103?s=3&r=74

Bills:
Congress 117 (2021-2022)
H.R.7875 - Emergency Infant Formula Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7875?s=8&r=2 
H.R.7822 - Baby Formula Emergency Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7822?s=8&r=3 
H.R.7808 - FORMULA Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7808?s=8&r=4 
H.R.7802 - To improve the infant formula supply chain, and for other purposes, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7802?s=8&r=5 
H.R.7576 - Securing Semiconductor Supply Chains Act of 2022: This bill requires the SelectUSA program to solicit comments from state economic development organizations regarding federal efforts to increase foreign direct investment in semiconductor-related manufacturing and production, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7576?s=4&r=15 
H.R.7550 - Oil and Gas Industry Antitrust Act: This bill requires the Federal Trade Commission to investigate and report on whether the price of gasoline is being manipulated by reducing refinery capacity or by any other form of market manipulation, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/7550?s=4&r=16
H.R.6478 - Supply Chain Resiliency Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/6478?s=4&r=28 
H.R.6359 - Investing in Domestic Semiconductor Manufacturing Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/6359?s=4&r=31 
H.R.6290 - Manufacturing.gov Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/6407?s=4&r=30 
H.R.6152 - Critical Infrastructure Manufacturing Feasibility Act: This bill requires the Department of Commerce to study and report on products that are in high demand across the critical infrastructure sectors, https://www.co:ngress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/6152?s=4&r=34 
H.R.6011 - Make in America to Sell in America Act of 2021: This bill requires certain actions to identify critical goods and establish minimum domestic content requirements, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/6011?s=8&r=7 
H.R.5555 - MADE HERE Act: This bill requires the National Institute of Standards and Technology, the Department of Energy, and the Department of Defense to establish a manufacturing cluster program to award resources and grants to eligible manufacturing clusters, and it establishes an interagency entity to oversee and coordinate the activities of manufacturing cluster programs at federal agencies, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5555?s=4&r=44 
H.R.5505 - Supply Chain Security and Resilience Act: This bill establishes a Supply Chain Resiliency and Crisis Response Office within the Department of Commerce, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5505?s=4&r=46 
H.R.5495 - Building Resilient Supply Chains Act, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5495?s=4&r=48 
H.R.5479 - Supply CHAIN Act: This bill establishes the Supply Chain Resiliency and Crisis Response Office to monitor and respond to disruptions in critical industries and supply chains, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5479?s=4&r=50 
H.R.5474 - Reinforcing American-Made Products Act: This bill specifies that the Federal Trade Commission's regulation of the labeling of products as Made in the U.S.A. or Made in America supersedes any conflicting state laws, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/5474?s=4&r=52 
H.R.3848 - Critical Supply Chains Commission Act: This bill establishes a National Commission on Critical Supply Chains to identify and investigate the dependencies, limitations, and risks associated with critical supply chains, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3848?s=4&r=91 
H.R.3413 - Agricultural Security Risk Review Act: This bill expands the membership of the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to include the Secretary of Agriculture, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3413?s=8&r=10 
H.R.3309 - MADE in The Americas Act: This bill establishes certain manufacturing incentives to increase trade between the United States and other countries in the Western Hemisphere, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3309?s=8&r=11 
H.R.2907 - Global Investment in American Jobs Act of 2021: This bill requires the Department of Commerce to conduct an interagency review of the global competitiveness of the United States in attracting foreign direct investment and addressing foreign trade barriers that firms in advanced technology sectors face in the global digital economy, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/2907?s=8&r=13 
H.R.2279 - Office of Manufacturing and Industrial Innovation Policy Act of 2021: This bill addresses the manufacturing capacity of the United States, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/2279?s=5&r=120 
H.R.1024 - COVID–19 Supply Chain Resiliency Act of 2021: This bill establishes the Office of COVID-19 Supply Chain Resiliency to identify and address supply chain issues related to the COVID-19, https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/1024?s=5&r=132 

Congress 116 (2019-2020)
H.R.8785 - B–BAM Act: This bill requires the Department of Commerce to establish the Committee on Building Back American Manufacturing to review and report on the strength, integrity, and capacity of the manufacturing base of the United States and supply chain for crucial, strategic resources and products in the United States., https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/8785?s=5&r=158 
H.R.7753 - Global Investment in American Jobs Act of 2020: This bill requires the Department of Commerce to conduct an interagency review of the global competitiveness of the United States in attracting foreign direct investment and addressing foreign trade barriers that firms in advanced technology sectors face in the global digital economy, https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/7753?s=8&r=18 
H.R.7178 - CHIPS for America Act: This bill establishes investments and incentives to support U.S. semiconductor manufacturing, research and development, and supply chain security, https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/7178?s=5&r=180 
H.R.6540 - Agricultural Security Risk Review Act: This bill expands the membership of the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to include the Secretary of Agriculture, https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/6540?s=8&r=21 
H.R.5430 - United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement Implementation Act: This bill provides statutory authority for the trade agreement between the United States, Mexico, and Canada (USMCA), which replaces the North American Free Trade Agreement, https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/5430?s=8&r=23 
H.R.5088 - Reinforcing American-Made Products Act of 2019: This bill specifies that the Federal Trade Commission's regulation of the labeling of products as "Made in the U.S.A." or "Made in America" supersedes any conflicting state laws., https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/5088?s=6&r=215 
H.R.3737 - Foreign Manufacturers Legal Accountability Act of 2019: This bill requires a foreign manufacturer of products imported into the United States to establish a registered agent in the United States to accept service of process for regulatory proceedings or civil actions, https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/3737?s=8&r=24 
H.R.3288 - GROW American Jobs Act of 2019: This bill provides statutory authority for the SelectUSA program within the Department of Commerce., https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/3288?s=6&r=233 
H.R.1710 - Automotive Jobs Act of 2019: This bill directs the U.S. International Trade Commission (USITC) to report on the status of the U.S. automotive industry, https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/1710?s=8&r=25
